oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Department of Energy Photograph Collection
Lines in the Post Office during the holidays
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: People holding packages stand in line at post office service windows
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Holidays; Post offices; Queues; Signs
Allen, Mrs. Murray; Porter, Mrs. George
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: See Oak Ridge Journal of December 14, 1944; "The two lucky women nearest the window are Mrs. George Porter, 107 West Vance Road, and Mrs. Murray Allen, 700 Penn Road."
